text: - A brown shirt buttoned. - Badges pinned. - Belt tightened. - Neck kerchief tied. = Socks pulled up. - Hair combed. Shoes clicked together at the heels, one foot stomps down hard on the floor. He is dressed. We PULL to a CLOSE-UP, coming face to face with our HERO

JOHANNES BETZLER, (JOJO), a cute 10 year-old boy. The room is covered with NAZI POSTERS and other PARAPHERNALIA, including pictures of ADOLF HITLER. You guessed it, he’s a little Nazi. Jojo stares into a full-length mirror and takes a deep breath. gogo Jojo Betzler. Ten years old. And today you join the ranks of the Jungvolk in a very special training weekend. It’s going to be intense. But today you become a man. (deep breath, nervous) I swear to devote all my energies and my strength to the savior of our country, Adolf Hitler. I am willing and ready to give up my life for him, so help me God. A STRANGE FIGURE passes behind him, an ADULT, dressed in NAZI UNIFORM. It feels ghostly and fantastical. We'll fin out who this guy is very soon.
Yeah man, that’s right. (beat) Now, Jojo Betzler, what is your mind? gogo A snake mind.
And Jojo Betzler, what is your body? (CONTINUED)
gogo A wolf body.
And Jojo Betzler, what is your courage?
Panther courage.
And Jojo Betzler, what is your soul?
A German soul.

Yeah man, you're ready. gogo Adolf, I don’t think I can do this. The stranger leans into shot, revealing it’s none other t Jojo's IMAGINARY FRIEND, ADOLF HITLER. However, it’s not Hitler we're all used to, he’s imaginary and therefore ca only know what Jojo knows. He’s more of a charming buffoo who floats through life with carefree, whimsical abandon.

What?! Of course you can. Sure you're a bit scrawny, unpopular, and still can’t tie your shoelaces without adult supervision, but you're also the bestest, most loyal little Nazi I've ever met. Not to mention you're incredibly handsome.
Jojo smiles. Feeling better.
Now you're gonna go out there and have a great time, ok?
Ok.
Ok, that’s the spirit! Now, Heil me man. gogo Heil Hitler.
Come on, you can do better than that. Heil Hitler! (CONTINUED)
Jogo Heil Hitler!
Just throw it away. Don’t even think about it. Jogo Heil Hitler!
No, you're over thinking it. Heil Hitler. Jogo Heil Hitler!
Heil HITLER. They start jogging on the spot. gogo Heil HITLER!
Ooh, that’s it. gogo
Yay, now you've got it! Jogo Heil Hitler! Heil Hitler! Heil Hitle: Heil Hitler! Heil Hitler! Heil Hitle
Ooh, have a great day! You're going to be the best. You can do it! Jojo and Adolf scream like war pigs and Jojo sprints out door.
MUSIC CUE: ‘KOMM GIB MIR DEINE HAND’ BY THE BEATLES
HOMETOWN WITH FOOTAGE OF HITLER’S RISE TO GOD STATUS -

head_text.subj: SCREAMING FANS, FANATICAL SUPPORTERS, PEOPLE CRYING, WOME

text: Jojo skips happily down the street, Heil Hitlering variou locals he passes by. He meets his best friend, YORKI, 10 chubby, gawky, clumsy, who waits for him in a doorway. Jogo Heil Hitler, Yorki!
Heil Hitler, Jojo! gogo Are you ready for the best weekend ever?
Yes I am! Jogo Let’s go! They run off together, continuing to Heil Hitler everyone they meet.

Jojo and Yorki sit with a large group of other young kids all dressed in Hitler Youth uniforms, in a sprawling fiel CAPTAIN KLENZENDORF, weathered, disillusioned, addresses crowd of kids. He has a DEAD-EYE and is accompanied by th awkwardly enthusiastic SUB-OFFICER FINKEL, and a brutish female instructor, FRAULEIN RAHM.
Heil Hitler, guys.
Heil Hitler!
Heil Hitler! (CONTINUED)
Jungvolk, welcome to the Hitlerjugend training weekend in which we will make men and women of you all. My name is Captain Klenzendorf - you may call me Captain K.
Captain K! Woo!

-and this is Sub-Officer Finkel. And Fraulein Rahm. (beat) So, a little about me. Who am I and why am I here talking to a bunch of little titty-grabbers instead of leading my men into battle towards glorious death? Great question. I’ve asked it myself every day since Operation Screw-Up, where I lost a perfectly good eye in a totally preventable enemy attack. And according to my superiors, you need two eyes to be a meaningful part of the war effort.

Beat. He picks up a rifle and quickly fires a shot, hitti target 100 yards away. The kids applaud. KLENZENDORF (CONT’D) Over the next two days you little critters will get to experience some of the things that the mighty German Army goes through every day. And even though it would appear our country’s on the back foot and that there really isn’t much hope us of winning this war, apparently we're doing just fine. (takes a breath, composes himself, he’s sad) Anyway. You boys have all been issued with your Deutsches Jungvolk Daggers. Jojo and Yorki inspect and admire their nice new DEUTSCHE JUNGVOLK (DJ) KNIVES. KLENZENDORF (CONT’D) These are very special and expensive weapons, you should never be without them. And don’t try to stab each other.
No stabbing! (CONTINUED)

This is your first step towards being men. Today you boys will be involved in such activities as marching, bayonet drills, grenade throwing, trench digging, map reading, gas defense, camouflage, trap setting, ambush techniques, war games, firing guns and blowing stuff up. Huge cheers from the group of boys. Jojo and Yorki smile each other, this is going to be awesome. KLENZENDORF (CONT’D) The girls will practice important womanly duties such as dressing wounds, making beds, and learning how to get pregnant. Groans of disappointment from the girls. Klenzendorf hold the bridge of his nose as if preparing for the impending headache he’s about to endure over the weekend. He sighs.
Alright, let’s get to it. The crowd of kids salute and start screaming in excitemen The older boys start yelling at smaller kids, rounding th up and y'know, being Nazis. Finkel and Rahm lead them off
On your feet you little Nazis! Let’s go!
Move, move, move! More screaming from the kids.

God help me. MONTAGE - HITLER YOUTH TRAINING CAMP... MUSIC CUE: ‘I DON’T WANT TO GROW UP’ BY TOM WAITS various scenes of Jojo and Yorki training with the Hitlerjugend. - A bunch of kids try and climb over obstacles and under nets. It’s mayhem. - KNIFE THROWING. Jojo and Yorki stand around in a group boys throwing their DJ knives from 10 FEET into a tree. (CONTINUED)

None of the knives stick, instead they fly off at dangero angles, one ricochets, lodging itself in another kid’s th - GUN RANGE. Jojo and some other kids aim their KARABINER RIFLES at a target in the distance. Jojo fires and, jumpi from the loudness of the shot, drops the rifle. - WAR GAME. The boys are separated into 2 groups, one sid wearing RED SASHES and the other GREEN. They chase each o round a clearing, pushing each other over and taking prisoners etc. Jojo and Yorki are taken prisoner instantl An older lad, CHRISTOPH, looks at them with disappointmen
Jojo sits in a group of boys and girls. One by one, somet overlapping, the children call out.

Horns / Serpent tongue / Fangs / Green blood / Claws. Their teacher, FRAULEIN RAHM, proudly writes the children words, along with others, on a blackboard. Above them is heading: THE JEW. Finkel stands nearby, observing and tak notes.

Fantastisch! Excellent work children. You also forgot that the Jew is the offspring of Satan and sucks the blood of Christian children for their mitzvah. Gasps from the children. Finkel nods - I'm afraid so. FRAULEIN RAHM (CONT’D) It has been scientifically proven that we Aryans are 1000 times more advanced and civilised than any other race. Gasps and applause from the children. Fraulein Rahm smile FRAULEIN RAHM (CONT’D) Now, get your things together kids, it’s time to burn some books!
Yayyyy!!!
A LARGE BONFIRE burns. The children hold stacks of books. Jojo opens his bag and pulls out a small pile.
Is that it? Only 4 books? gogo It’s all I could find on the list. (reading the authors) Kafka... Brecht... Hesse losers.
Burn you

He throws them into the fire, Yorki follows suit. The boo land among other burning authors, FREUD, MANN, PROUST HEMINGWAY, REMARQUE. The children skip and dance round the bonfire, throwing b into the inferno while Fraulein Rahm cackles maniacally.
An encampment. Tents glow under the night sky

Jojo and Yorki lie awake in sleeping bags, inspecting the new DJ KNIVES. gogo Imagine being in a battle, you've just run out of ammo, all you have is your DJ Knife. I would take down 20 of them before they got me. And I’d be laughing when they did.
I don’t like that situation. I don’t want to die at all. Jogo Live Faithfully, Fight Bravely, and Die Laughing, Yorki, that’s the motto.
I know but I wouldn’t be laughing. I'd probably be screaming. (CONTINUED)

gogo Then I’m afraid you might not be cut out for Hitler’s personal guard. It’s really hard to get chosen y'know. You need to have perfect vision, perfect teeth and you're only allowed a little bit of fat.
(prodding his chubbiness) Jews sound scary, huh? gogo Not to me. If I met one I’d kill it like that. (tries to snap his fingers) that.
Like
But how would you know if you saw one? They can look just like us. JosO Oh I'd know. I’d feel it’s head for horns. And they smell like Brussels Sprouts.
Oh yeah, I forgot about the Brussels Sprouts bit. gogo Imagine catching one and giving it to Hitler. That’d be a sure-fire way to get into his personal guard.
He'd be so impressed. gogo Then we would become best friends.

I thought I was your best friend gogo Yorki, you're my second best friend. First place is reserved for the Fihrer. He, and only he can have that spot, so unless you’re Hitler hiding in a fat little boy’s body I'd be happy with 2nd place. (CONTINUED)
I’m just a kid in a fat kid’s body. gogo Case closed. Jojo rolls over and stares at the sky. JOJO (CONT’D) (whispering) Night papa, I hope you come home soon. Night Inga, I hope you're happy up there
Jojo sits with a bunch of other kids. Two team leaders, CHRISTOPH and HANS, (21) smoke cigarettes and hold court. Christoph kisses a girl before turning to the kids.
When you stand before the enemy and have to end his life, which of you will have the stomach for it? Everyone raises their hands. Jojo too, although a little slow.
There is no room in Hitler's army for those who lack strength. We want hardened warriors who are prepared to kill at will. Can you do that?
Yes / Sure / Oh absolutely
Johannes? Can you kill? gogo Pf£f, of course. I love killing.
Good... Hans uncovers a small cage nearby - it is filled with lit rabbits. Hans takes a bunny from the cage and holds it ou towards Jojo.
Kill it. (CONTINUED)
ll.
Jogo Hmm?
Wring its neck. Kill the rabbit gogo Oh, I’m ok. I might do it later.
No later, NOW. Or are you scared?
gogo I’m not scared. I'm just allergic to fur and I don’t want itchy hands all weekend. Hans shoves the rabbit into Jojo's hands.

Place both hands around its neck and then one hard twist. He might scream but we'll just use the boot to finish it off. Rill... kill... Jojo, shaking now, holds the bunny and looks at it direct in the eye. He gulps. The boys join the chant

Kill, Kill, Kill, Kill... The boys are like baying wolves; they crouch in around Jo as he leans over the rabbit. Jojo DROPS the bunny, trying to shoo it away. But it does run and Hans steps forward, grabs the rabbit, and snaps i neck. Shocked gasps and squeaks of horror from the kids. of them faints. Probably Yorki.
Coward. Just like your father.
He's not a coward, he’s in Italy.
No one has heard from him in two years. He's a deserting coward just like you.
Yeah, he’s a deserter.
No, he doesn’t do that, he fights. (CONTINUED )
He’s scared and so are you. You're as scared as a rabbit. He kicks Jojo to the ground. Hans places a boot on his ne

Scared little rabbit. Maybe we should snap your neck too. The rest of the kids taunt Jojo. He stands and runs into woods, trying to escape the laughter. Hans encourages the chant “Jojo Rabbit” as he runs.
Jojo sits alone on a log, sobbing to himself. He looks up see a little BUTTERFLY flitting around by his feet... and then a voice comes from behind.
Poor Jojo, what’s wrong, little man’ Jojo turns around, it’s Adolf gogo Hi Adolf. Adolf takes a seat.

Why so down in the dumps? A strong boy like yourself shouldn't be sad, you should be happy like a cloud! Clouds don’t care about anything! gogo They called me a coward. And my papa, they say he makes desserts instead of fighting. But I know he’s still fighting for you, for me, and for Germany.

Oh, of course he is! And he is also making nice desserts, nothing wrong with that. My God, his custard tarts are the only thing keeping up morale at the front. (beat) Want to tell me about the rabbit incident? What was that all about? (CONTINUED)
gogo They wanted me to kill it. I’m sorry.
Meh, don’t worry about it. I couldn't care less. Just like a cloud. Jogo But now they call me a scared rabbit.

Well you want to know something? (Off Jojo's nod) Just because they’re small and delightfully cute doesn’t mean rabbits are cowards. The rabbit faces a dangerous world everyday, hunting carrots for his family... for his country. Forget those boys. They have their place and so do you. My empire will be made up of all animals, eagles, lions, elephants and even the mighty rabbit. Hitler offers Jojo a cigarette. gogo No thanks, I don't sm-~

Can I give you some really good advice? Be the rabbit. The humble bunny can outwit all his enemies and that is why he is a hero. Be. The. Rabbit. He winks at Jojo who tries to wink back but still can onl manage a weird double wink-blink. Adolf wanders off. Just then, Yorki arrives.
Jojo! Are you alright Jojo? Who were you talking to? Jogo Nobody, I was just out here doing some push-ups for my muscles.
Oh, I thought you were crying. gogo Are you a teardrop specialist? (CONTINUED)
No. gogo Case closed. Now, Yorki Dorky, it’s time for Jojo to show these pip-squeaks who is the real cowardly rabbit. He takes a deep breath and scurries off into the bushes.
I’m sorry what are you talking about? Jogo Never mind.
Jojo, where are you going? gogo To be the rabbit!

Captain Klenzendorf sits in a deck chair. He pulls the pi a HAND-GRENADE and hurls it into an open space. It EXPLOD REVEAL he is holding a lesson on hand-grenades. Hans, Christoph, and the rest of the boys watch from the safety a TRENCH.

Now lads, each of you will be given the opportunity to ignite and throw a grenade. I will personally be supervising each of you to make sure you don’t blow your eyes out or something. Now, who's first? Klaus. Come on lad. A boy steps up and holds out his hand to take a grenade. Klenzendorf goes to hand it to him there’s a sudden flurr Jojo bursts out of the bushes and onto the scene. Jogo Jojo rabbit! Jojo rabbit! Hunting carrots, Jojo rabbit! He jumps across the trench and, snatching the grenade fro Klenzendorf’s hand, continues into the clearing beyond. Suddenly Adolf appears, running next to Jojo. (CONTINUED)

This is amazing! We're like two human antelopes! Jojo pulls the PIN on the grenade and screams an ungodly cry as he hurls it into the air. It bounces off a tree th ricochets backwards, landing at his feet. Jogo Scheisse.
Shiiiiiit. BOOM. Jojo is blown up.
Don't do that. cur TO: EXT. WOODS - JOJO’S POV JoJo's POV - Jojo is being carried on a stretcher through woods. Klenzendorf’s face leans in to shot.

(lying BADLY) Don’t worry kid, you're doing fine. You look great. Yorki leans in, his eyes go wide, he faints. Adolf leans in. Gives Jojo the THUMBS UP. But he looks worried and disgusted. He also faints.
Now we're in an ambulance. Fraulein Rahm leans in, her face contorts in disgust.
Oh God, he looks like a Picasso painting. (beat) Cubist period.
Jojo's stretcher is being wheeled down a corridor.  16.
Bright lights. The doctor hovers over us, we see INSTRUME Klenzendorf steps into shot, addresses the DOCTOR.
His mother’s going to kill me. Adolf leans in, smiles and gives us the thumbs up. Jojo’s BLOODIED THUMB comes into view. FADE OUT.
= A woman’s face comes in to focus. This is Jojo’s mother ROSIE BETZLER. As she reaches the bed, she stops, puts he hand over her mouth. Her eyes well with tears.

Jojo... my darling cub. = Jojo’s hand raises into shot, reaching out to her. The floods with tears, de-focuses, and fades. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - BEDROOM ~ MORNING A NEW JOJO stands before us in front of the mirror. He ha scars on one side of his face, his RIGHT ARM appears stif and he now has a limp.
Hey kid. In the mirror Jojo sees his mother standing at the door, smiling. She hugs him tightly, making growling noises.
My darling little cub. gogo Why so happy? Your son is ugly like a monster.
You're no monster. You're still my beautiful Jojo. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
Besides the doctors are confident those scars will heal and you'll get most of the movement back in your leg. But I’m just happy to have you back home. Jogo I'll never be in Hitler’s SS Guard now.
You're fine as you are. gogo I need to be better.
You need to be you. Mama Lion worries about her cub, that’s all. Especially when papa Lion isn’t here. oso Or Inga.
Or Inga. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - LOUNGE ROOM - MOMENTS LATER Jojo tries to tie his bootlaces but has trouble with only good hand. Rosie kneels down and helps him.

A few more months and you'll get it. You grab the rabbit by the tail, wrap it around his ear, tie it all up and then stuff him back (on) down the hole. (then) Now, we better get on our way. Getting out of the house will do wonders for your recuperation. Rosie helps Jojo into his jacket. He catches another glim of himself in a mirror. gogo I don’t want to go out there.
Don’t be silly, of course you do: gogo I look stupid. People will stare. (CONTINUED)

Let them! Enjoy the attention, kid. Not everyone is lucky enough to look stupid. What I wouldn’t give. She looks in the mirror. ROSIE (CONT’D) Instead I am cursed to look incredibly... attractive... Entranced, she moves in, almost kissing her reflection. ROSIE (CONT’D) Now, you're going to pluck up your courage, walk out that door and have a fantastic adventure. Okay? gogo (nodding, unsure) Okay. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - FRONT DOOR - MOMENTS LATER Rosie parts the blinds on the front door and peeks outsid

Field Marshall Jojo, looks like the coast is clear. Now... Looking over her shoulder, she produces a large, plain biscuit. It’s all covert and over the top, but fun for Jo ROSIE (CONT’D) -many good men died to bring you this. It’s a special potato-flour biscuit for emergencies. Emergencies dammit! Not only is it a biscuit, but it also doubles as an eye-patch in case you are invited to a pirate party. It could pass for a shield, an earring, a spare wheel, and even a believable discus should you find yourself participating in a biscuit Olympiad. And in a pinch it also acts as a type of food to sustain you until dinner. (then, peeking out the door once more) Field Marshall Jojo, you're our top man. Prepare to leave the house...
Jojo smiles and prepares himself, playing along. (CONTINUED)
gogo Is it dangerous? Rosie smiles and winks.
Extremely
Jojo and Rosie enter the HITLER YOUTH OFFICE.

A giant room. Nazi Propaganda adorns the office and large SWASTIKA BANNERS hang on the walls. The woman from the HJ Camp, FRAULEIN RAHM, sits at a desk, staring intensely at large framed photo of HITLER on the wall. A couple of TEENAGE YOUTH OFFICERS loiter about practicin stabbing things with their DJ Knives while some BDM GIRLS operate a PRINTING PRESS which spits out pages of PROPAGA FINKEL is off to the side listening to music through HEADPHONES and dancing like Ian Curtis from Joy Division,
Fraulein Rahm jumps.
Jesus. Captain Klenzendorf emerges from his office.
Jojo Betzler! Looking good, friend! (beat, to Rosie) Frau Betzler. Rosie walks up to Klenzendorf and kicks him in the balls. drops to the ground. KLENZENDORF (CONT‘D) Owwww
Ok, that’s that. Because of you, my kid has lost the feeling in his arm and can’t walk properly and has a messed up face. (CONTINUED)
But he stole the hand-grenade!
Yeah yeah. Now you're going to take care of him while I go to work. You'll give him a job and make sure he feels included. Got it?
Got it. I really got it.
Good.
(standing) Wow. Ok let’s start this again. Everyone, this is Johannes Betzler. Remember he stole a hand-grenade and blew himself up and as a result I got kicked in the nuts by his mother.
You sure did.
I also got demoted if that makes you feel better.
It does.
So, Jojo. Great to see you. Alive. I'm sure we can figure out something for you to do (beat) Ideas guys? Come on!

Well, we need someone to walk the clones. They haven't been outside in weeks and some of them are malfunctioning. REVEAL: In the corner of the room we see about a DOZEN 8 OLD CLONES, doing various chores, typing, sweeping, paint playing chess. Some are just standing there dribbling FRAULEIN RAHM (CONT’D) Also, you could hand out some of this propaganda and deliver these conscriptions. (CONTINUED)
ai.
gogo I don’t suppose I could be conscripted could 1?

(shaking her head throughout ) Great idea! I give you full permission to send this ten year old child off to war Someone give this guy a gun! gogo Actually mother I’m feeling quite fit and would be more than happy to fight at the front.

Get in line kid. Besides, you’re still on the mend. For now you can start small. Conscripts and propaganda. gogo As you wish. I will execute my orders with precision and strength, like a precise... boulder. Beat.
Just deliver the stuff , kid.
Jawohl! He turns on his heels and is OUT.
Jojo pins up some posters of HITLER in a stoic pose, look off into the distance. Below him is the propaganda slogan

head_text.subj: ONE PEOPLE, ONE EMPIRE, ONE LEADER

text: Jojo turns and joins his mother who is staring at a make- shift GALLOWS. FIVE BODIES, men and women hang from the c beam gogo Yuck. He tries to turn away but Rosie takes his head and turns back to the view. (CONTINUED)
Look. gogo What did they do?
(shrugs ) What they could. (beat) Come on. They leave.
Jojo pastes more propaganda and public announcements arou town, A truck drives past and we see one of the forest bullies, HANS, on the back with a bunch of other young soldiers.

Hey, Jojo Rabbit! Oh my God, look at your face! Ewwww! (beat) Look at me, I ama soldier now and you are just a pathetic postman! I am a soldier! I'm going to war! (then, chanting) Jojo Rabbit! Jojo Rabbit! The chant continues as Hans and his buddies laugh at Jojo INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - DINING ROOM Jojo arrives home. Jogo Mama! I'm home. He drops his satchel and heads for the kitchen.

Mama, Field Marshall Jojo is home. Suddenly, a noise from upstairs. A small THUD. Jojo looks JOJO (CONT’D) Mama Lion?  23. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - INGA’S BEDROOM - LATER Jojo slowly makes his way down the upstairs hall, looking rooms. He moves towards his sister’s room. He takes a mom before stepping into the room and wandering around. He lo at a photo of INGA, smiles and puts it back. Then... Jojo notices something on the other side of the room. On ground sits a picture in a frame. He picks it up and then Sees: A THIN CUT IN THE WALLPAPER in the shape of a door. Jojo takes his trusty DJ KNIFE and pries the door OPEN. A Jojo's eyes adjust he begins making out objects. At first it’s only BOOKS. Jogo The bad books. It’s not allowed. Then he sees a candle, bedding, a plate, a fork, AND... .+.a SKINNY, PALE CREATURE hunched in the corner, its fac partially hidden beneath her hair, dark eyes staring back Screaming with fright, Jojo drops his knife and stumbles out into the room. Frozen in fear, Jojo stares into the darkness beyond the secret door. Slowly, a pale hand wraps around the corner, then a skinny GIRL emerges. This is ELSA KORR (17)

Hi Jojo bolts as fast as he can, out the door and downstairs where he trips and lands on the bottom landing. ELSA (0.S.) (CONT’D) Little boy... STOMP. STOMP. STOMP. Footsteps on the stairs get louder. Eventually Elsa rounds the corner halfway up the stairs. Jogo What do you want? Are you a ghost?
(smiling spookily) Sure. A ghost. gogo Get out of my house! (CONTINUED)
Johannes, that’s no way to treat a ghost. Jogo Why do you live in the wall?!

Where else should a ghost live? Beat. Jojo leaps up and tries to make a run for it, but before he can reach the door she grabs him by the scruff the neck and slams him into a wall. ELSA (CONT’D) Don’t make me run kid, I’m far too hungry and you know how much we love the taste of blood. Jojo checks his sheath for his DJ KNIFE but it’s empty. E reveals the knife in her hand ELSA (CONT’D) Lose something? (beat) I'm not a ghost Johannes, I’m something worse. But I think you already know that don’t you? You know what I am. gogo No. She presses the knife to his throat,
Yes. Say it. gogo (he gulps, futile) Jew.
Gesundheit. gogo You can’t be here.
Well your mother invited me so I suppose that makes me her guest. gogo No. It’s not allowed. (CONTINUED)

What will you do sweet Hitlerchen? Jojo's eyes dart towards the door, and then the telephone ELSA (CONT’D) Of course. Go on then, tell them. But you know what happens if you do? I'll say you helped me. And your mother too. Then we'll all be kaput. and if you tell her you know about me... just one word... (raising the knife to his neck) I’ll do the world a great big favour and cut your Nazi head off. Got it? She releases him and backs away, still holding the knife. ELSA (CONT’D) I think I‘11 hold onto this. It’s pretty. She wanders back up the stairs leaving Jojo in shock. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - JOJO’S BEDROOM - MOMENTS LATER Jojo sits on his bed, petrified
Sheesh, that was intense. Adolf is sitting next to him. gogo What am I gonna do??
Honestly, NO idea. There could be more of them. In the walls. Hundreds of them
They look around at the walls. They huddle closer togethe ADOLF (CONT‘D) How the hell did she get control like that? gogo She used her powers I guess. Mind control. (CONTINUED )
oh, typical. Did you see how fast she moved? And now she’s got your fancy knife. Jogo I know! My knife! Adolf offers Jojo a cigarette. He waves it away.

You're definitely in a pickle. (he snaps his fingers) Got itt (then) Ah damn, actually I don’t have it. But then. gogo ADOLF (CONT'D) Got it. Got it! (beat ) (beat) I have to negotiate. You have to burn the house down and blame Winston Churchill. Beat.

Ok. Try your idea first. INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - INGA’S BEDROOM - MOMENTS LATER Jojo enters Inga/Elsa's room. He's wearing household obje as ARMOUR; A POT sits on his head, he holds a KITCHEN KNI and he has a TRASH-CAN LID for a shield. He goes to the CLOSED secret door and knocks twice. KNOCK-KNOCK. gogo Excuse me? Hello? Little girl? um, Jew girl in the wall? (beat) Yoohoo, Jew? Just over his shoulder Adolf encourages Jojo to continue. (CONTINUED)

Ok well, I’1l just say what I have to say and that’s this: I’m not scared of you and I think you should find somewhere else to live. Adolf taps his watch. Jojo nods. JOJO (CONT’D) ok? From behind, in his ear, where Adolf was just standing

Not okay. Jojo spins, she’s right behind him, holding his knife smiling. She kicks him hard against his trash-can lid shi He flies back, hitting the wall and collapsing in a heap. Elsa picks up the KITCHEN KNIFE, flips it in her hand. ELSA (CONT’D) Get the hell out of my room. Jogo Argh!!!
She’s pretty rude, y’know. That’s just my 2 pfennige... INT. JOJO’S HOUSE - JOJO’S BEDROOM - DAY Back in the safety of Jojo’s bedroom, Jojo and Adolf pace
-+.and now she’s got TWO knives! Jogo I know!
How are you going to chop up stuff? gogo I don’t know!
